name: Meganoble
description:
fight through demons on behalf of humanity by order of a higher being
in an amazing platformer game using your special to one shot weak
enemies or your regular attacks to get past them in hopes to reach the
end of every stage where a boss will be waiting for you who's skill will
be the combination of all the enemies you faced for that stage.
for a total of 5 stages to be played.

Visit https://www.thenerdmansion.com/ for more games by thenerdmansion

Movement: Left Key, Right Key
Attack: Z key
Jump: X key
Dash: C key
Special: Up Key (available when the special bar fills up every 60 seconds)          Mouse: select levels in menu
